cards.name: Celestial Vault
cards.originalText:
{W}, {T}: Draft a card from Celestial Vault's spellbook and exile it face down.
{1}, Sacrifice Celestial Vault: Put each card exiled with Celestial Vault into your hand.
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Draft a card from Celestial Vault's spellbook and exile it face down.

cards.name: Herald of Vengeance
cards.originalText:
Flying
When Herald of Vengeance enters the battlefield, destroy each permanent you don't control that has the same name as a permanent that dealt damage to you last turn.

Flying
When Herald of Vengeance enters the battlefield, destroy each permanent you don't control that has the same name as a permanent that dealt damage to you last turn.

cards.name: Skyline Savior
cards.originalText:
Flying
When Skyline Savior enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand. If it's a non-Angel creature card, it perpetually gets +1/+1, gains flying, and becomes an Angel in addition to its other types.

Flying

cards.name: Agent of Raffine
cards.originalText: {2}, {T}: Choose target opponent. Conjure a duplicate of the top card of their library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell." Then they exile the top card of their library face down.
cards.text: {2}, {T}: Choose target opponent. Conjure a duplicate of the top card of their library into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell." Then they exile the top card of their library face down.

cards.name: Choice of Fortunes
cards.originalText:
Seek two cards. You may shuffle them into your library. If you do, seek two cards.
You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
cards.text:
Seek two cards. You may shuffle them into your library. If you do, seek two cards.
You have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.

cards.name: Nightclub Bouncer
cards.originalText:
Flash
When Nightclub Bouncer enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} more to cast."
cards.text:
Flash
When Nightclub Bouncer enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {2} more to cast."

cards.name: Graven Archfiend
cards.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a non-Demon creature.
Flying
When Graven Archfiend enters the battlefield, if its additional cost was paid, conjure a card named Demonic Pact onto the battlefield.
cards.text:

Flying
When Graven Archfiend enters the battlefield, if its additional cost was paid, conjure a card named Demonic Pact onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Shattering Finale
cards.originalText:
Casualty 1 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 1 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
Target creature an opponent controls perpetually gets -0/-3.
cards.text:
Casualty 1
Target creature an opponent controls perpetually gets -0/-3.

cards.name: Xander's Wake
cards.originalText: Whenever one or more creatures you control die, draft a card from Xander's Wake's spellbook. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control die, draft a card from Xander's Wake's spellbook. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.name: Big Spender
cards.originalText:
Haste
Whenever one or more creatures you control become blocked, create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice two artifacts: Draft a card from Big Spender's spellbook.
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever one or more creatures you control become blocked, create a Treasure token.
Sacrifice two artifacts: Draft a card from Big Spender's spellbook.

cards.name: Pass the Torch
cards.originalText: Pass the Torch deals 2 damage to any target. Choose a creature card in your hand. It perpetually gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target card named Pass the Torch from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, this creature perpetually loses this ability".
cards.text: Pass the Torch deals 2 damage to any target. Choose a creature card in your hand. If you do, this creature perpetually loses this ability".

cards.name: Traumatic Prank
cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It perpetually gains haste, "This creature can't block," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."
cards.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It perpetually gains haste, "This creature can't block," and "At the beginning of your upkeep, this creature deals 1 damage to you."

cards.name: Giant Regrowth
cards.originalText: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a creature card, it perpetually gets +3/+3.
cards.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If it's a creature card, it perpetually gets +3/+3.

cards.name: Loose in the Park
cards.originalText:
Enchant land
When Loose in the Park enters the battlefield, draw a card, then draft a card from Loose in the Park's spellbook and exile it.
{3}: Until end of turn, enchanted land becomes a copy of the exiled card, except it's a land in addition to its other types and it has haste.
cards.text:
Enchant land
When Loose in the Park enters the battlefield, draw a card, then draft a card from Loose in the Park's spellbook and exile it.
{3}: Enchanted land becomes a copy of the exiled card until end of turn and gains haste. It's still a land.

cards.name: Menagerie Curator
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add one mana of any one color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
Whenever you cast a creature spell that doesn't share a creature type with a creature card in your library, draw a card.
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
Whenever you cast a creature spell that doesn't share a creature type with a creature card in your library, draw a card.

cards.name: Arming Gala
cards.originalText: At the beginning of your end step, creatures you control and creature cards in your hand, library, and graveyard perpetually get +1/+1.
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, creatures you control and creature cards in your hand, library, and graveyard perpetually get +1/+1.

cards.name: Back-Alley Gardener
cards.originalText: Alliance — Whenever one or more other creatures enter the battlefield under your control, seek a land card, then put it onto the battlefield tapped. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.text: Alliance — Whenever one or more other creatures enter the battlefield under your control, seek a land card, then put it onto the battlefield tapped. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.name: Bank Job
cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the bottom creature card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if that card is still exiled, put it into your graveyard and create a Treasure token.
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the bottom creature card of your library. You may cast that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if that card is still exiled, put it into your graveyard and create a Treasure token.

cards.name: Bind to Secrecy
cards.originalText:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Conjure a duplicate of target creature card in an opponent's graveyard into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."
If there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, draft a card from Bind to Secrecy's spellbook.
cards.text:

• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Conjure a duplicate of target creature card in an opponent's graveyard into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."
If there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, draft a card from Bind to Secrecy's spellbook.

cards.name: Brokers' Safeguard
cards.originalText: Exile target nonartifact creature you control. It perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
cards.text: Exile target nonartifact creature you control. It perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

cards.name: Cabaretti Revels
cards.originalText: Whenever you cast a creature spell, seek a creature card with lesser mana value, then put it onto the battlefield.
cards.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, seek a creature card with lesser mana value, then put it onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Diviner of Fates
cards.originalText:
When Diviner of Fates enters the battlefield, it connives. (Draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever you discard one or more cards, seek a card that shares a card type with one of the discarded cards. This ability triggers only once each turn.
cards.text:
When Diviner of Fates enters the battlefield, it connives.
Whenever you discard one or more cards, seek a card that shares a card type with one of the discarded cards. This ability triggers only once each turn.

cards.name: Effluence Devourer
cards.originalText:
Whenever you sacrifice Effluence Devourer or another creature, it perpetually gains "{2}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is this card's power. Activate only as a sorcery."
Blitz {B}{R}{G} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Obscura Polymorphist
cards.originalText: When Obscura Polymorphist enters the battlefield, exile target creature. Its controller seeks a creature card.
cards.text: When Obscura Polymorphist enters the battlefield, exile up to one target creature. Its controller seeks a creature card.

cards.name: Racketeer Boss
cards.originalText: When Racketeer Boss enters the battlefield, choose up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards in your hand. They perpetually gain "When you cast this spell, create a Treasure token."
cards.text: When Racketeer Boss enters the battlefield, choose up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards in your hand. They perpetually gain "When you cast this spell, create a Treasure token and this spell perpetually loses this ability."

cards.name: Riveteers Provocateur
cards.originalText:
Menace
When Riveteers Provocateur enters the battlefield, choose a creature card in your hand without blitz. It perpetually gains blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana cost.
Blitz {B}{R} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Rope Line Attendant
cards.originalText: When Rope Line Attendant enters the battlefield, creature cards in your hand perpetually gain "When this creature enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token."
cards.text: When Rope Line Attendant enters the battlefield, creature cards in your hand perpetually gain "When this creature enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token."

cards.name: Spara's Bodyguard
cards.originalText:
When Spara's Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you may choose a creature card in your hand. If you do, it perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Otherwise, put a shield counter on Spara's Bodyguard. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
At the beginning of each combat, Spara's Bodyguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each shield counter among other creatures you control.
cards.text:
When Spara's Bodyguard enters the battlefield, you may choose a creature card in your hand. If you do, it perpetually gains "This creature enters the battlefield with an additional shield counter on it." Otherwise, put a shield counter on Spara's Bodyguard.
At the beginning of each combat, Spara's Bodyguard gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each shield counter among other creatures you control.

cards.name: Spelldrain Assassin
cards.originalText: When Spelldrain Assassin enters the battlefield, choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains casualty 2. (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)
cards.text: When Spelldrain Assassin enters the battlefield, choose an instant or sorcery card in your hand. It perpetually gains casualty 2.

cards.name: Syndicate Recruiter
cards.originalText:
Flying, ward {1}
When Syndicate Recruiter enters the battlefield, mill four cards. Then if there are five or more mana values among cards in your graveyard, conjure a card named Dig Up the Body into your hand.
